alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:01PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of La Paz, northeastern Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 1045 PM MST... At 1001 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Alamo Lake State Park to near Salome to 16 miles southeast of Vicksburg Junction to near Sundad. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quartzsite, Alamo Lake State Park, Salome, Brenda, Vicksburg Junction, Wenden, Kofa Wildlife Refuge, Vicksburg, Bouse, Sundad, Harcuvar and Palm Canyon. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 8 and 76. US Highway 60 between mile markers 31 and 75. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Tonopah Desert
